lead_paragraph: ARIDA--Gloria, died peacefully on April 26, 2016. Beloved sister to Lila Bandon (Arida), Gladys Schondorf (Arida) and the late Edward. Cherished aunt to many and dear friend to all. Services are entrusted to McLaughlin and Sons Funeral Home, Brooklyn, NY. 1/3
